title: Oscar the Italian Cat
description: Oscar and Mercy are going on holiday!Oscar has some big life decisions to makebut, in true Oscar style, nothing quitegoes according to plan.Interspersed with recognisable Venetianlandmarks, this humorous tale will take youon a colourful and winding tour along thecanals of Venice, meeting lots of interestingcharacters on the way!A joyous tribute to the beauty and magicof Venetian life and the people luckyenough to call it home.
author: Molly Arbuthnott
